Result.Abstract: The problem of the approximation of nonlinear mapping, (especially continuous mappings) is considered. Result.Title: Networks for approximation and learning

Result.Title: Face Recognition: Features Versus Templates

Result.Title: Example-Based Learning for View-Based Human Face Detection

Result.Title: Prediction of central nervous system embryonal tumour outcome based on gene expression

Result.Title: A Computational Theory of Human Stereo Vision

Result.Title: Hierarchical models of object recognition in cortex

Result.Title: Example-Based Object Detection in Images by Components

Result.Title: Comparing support vector machines with Gaussian kernels to radial basis function classifiers

Result.Title: A Trainable System for Object Detection

Result.Abstract: Computational vision is a set of inverse problems. We review standard regularization theory, discuss its limitations, and present new stochastic (in particular, Bayesian) methods for their solution. Result.Title: Probabilistic Solution of Ill-Posed Problems in Computational Vision
